en: Maybe I'll explore somewhere else first.
zh_TW: 也許我該先探索別的地方。

en: It's not time for that yet.
It's not time for that yet.
Not yet. I'd rather make sure I have everything I need first.
zh_TW: 還沒。我要先確定我有所有必要的東西。

en: Not yet. I want to finish preparing the classrooms first.
zh_TW: 還沒。我要先把教室準備好。

en: I'd rather not get into anymore trouble than I already am.
zh_TW: 我不想再惹上更多麻煩。

en: Burning the school down is not part of the ritual.
zh_TW: 把學校燒掉不是儀式的一部分。

en: Burning the school down is not part of the ritual.
zh_TW: 把學校燒掉不是儀式的一部分。

en: I think I'll pass on burning the school down today.
zh_TW: 我想我不打算今天把學校燒掉。

en: I think I'll pass on burning the school down today.
zh_TW: 我想我不打算今天把學校燒掉。

en: I think I'll pass on burning the school down today.
zh_TW: 我想我不打算今天把學校燒掉。

en: This isn't the time for that.
zh_TW: 現在不是做這件事的時候。

en: Some textbooks you don't care about.
A model of Earth. It's fun to spin it.
zh_TW: 地球模型。轉起來很好玩。

en: A paper slip with a list of regulations.
No one reads these, why do they bother?
zh_TW: 沒有人會讀，為什麼要搞得這麼麻煩？

en: Some classroom attendance sheets and schedules.
The plant is no longer happy.
There's a useless history book as well.

zh_TW: 非常厚重、跟學校有關的書本。
沒有什麼有用的東西了。

en: A trash can. You feel uninclined to dig through it.
zh_TW: 垃圾桶。妳不想去翻攪它。

en: Uh-oh. The curtains here are missing.
According to the ritual instructions, I need to black out all the rooms...
zh_TW: 依據儀式的說明，我需要把所有教室的光線遮住…

en: But where will I find new curtains...?
zh_TW: 但是我該去哪裡找新窗簾呢…？

en: Maybe the theater club has some curtains I can borrow?
zh_TW: 也許話劇社有些窗簾可以借走？

en: I hope these curtains will work.
I replaced the missing curtains. No need to mess with it anymore.
I need to block the light from this window.
zh_TW: 我需要把這扇窗戶的光線遮住。

en: Should I sort the desks in this classroom now?
zh_TW: 我應該現在把教室的桌子排好嗎？
